title: 4K Patch?
body: Is there any ETA for 4K Patch?  Haven't really been able to play League since I got the new computer.  Super upsetting since I put OVER a thousand dollars into the game.

replies.body: I don't have any info first hand on how quickly 4K support is coming, but the main reason it hasn't been fully supported thus far is that most of the player base hasn't transitioned to 4K ready equipment.
I dont know about most of us that play on 4k monitors but literally all i want is a scaling fix. Just add the option to alter the size of stuff like that,. Surely it cant be hard?
